name: Jack's bday
description:
Game made for SCREAM JAM 2020

Happy halloween! Hope you like it! 

Notes:

  • I have provided the web version of this game but please download the game for best experience
  • If you choose to run the web version instead:
    • I suggest to use Chrome (I have not tested in other software)
    • Chrome might close! So keep that in mind. 
    • Usually it runs smoothly once the assets are loaded, so if your game is taking too long to start please wait, or reload the chrome page, it eventually loads.
  • To fully experience the gameplay, use headphones and turn your lights off :P
  • The game contais some light flashes (really simple ones, just for ambient), if you have trouble with that I advise you not to play the game.
  • I did not have enought time to do volume configuration! Sorry. Use the computer volume instead.
  • This project was made only for fun, and it's completely free, donations are not allowed.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - look
  • E - Interact
  • ESC - Quit
  • SPACE - Jump (not necessary thought lol)
  • Right click - Zoom

Made by:

  • gubebra (https://gubebra.itch.io/)

Bug:

Run sound plays when shift is pressed, fixing it after jam ends.

If you played the game:

Thanks for playing it! I tried to keep it fun and interesting, rather than focusing on jumpscares! Feedbacks are always welcome! I'd love to hear what you have to say! And I hope I didn't spook you... to much.

IMPORTANT
